code: import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var RandomAvatar=function RandomAvatar(props){var MAX=4;var PATH="assets/pexels/";var DEFAULT_SIZE=50;var style=props.style;var className=props.className;var id=props.id;var size=props.size;var filePath;if(id===undefined){var rand=Math.round(Math.random()*MAX);filePath=PATH+"".concat(rand,".jpg");}else{filePath=PATH+"".concat(id,".jpg");}var css={};if(style)css=Object.assign({},style);if(!size){css.height="".concat(DEFAULT_SIZE,"px");css.width="".concat(DEFAULT_SIZE,"px");}else{css.height="".concat(size,"px");css.width="".concat(size,"px");}css.background="url(\"".concat(filePath,"\") center center / cover");css.boxShadow="inset 0 0 0 1px var(--theme-black-01)";return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"random-avatar rounded-full "+className,style:css});};export default RandomAvatar;
